name: Clara
initial dialogs: Hi, {playername}, how's it going?;Oh! Is that a pokemon you've got there? Are you going to be a trainer then?;Well have fun on your adventures and take care!
main dialogs: Hello again, how's the adventuring going?

name: Desmond
initial dialogs: Oh, you got a pokemon, {playername}!;It looks so adorable.;Why don't you give it an everstone to hold?;If it holds an everstone then you don't have to worry about it evolving.;Also, it might learn moves sooner if it doesn't evolve.;Here, have my everstone...
main dialogs: How's your pokemon doing? Did you let it evolve?

name: Sarah
initial dialogs: You're a trainer aren't you?;Why don't you take this Exp. Share I have, I don't really want it.;If you give it to a pokemon then it can gain experience from a battle even if it doesn't participate.
main dialogs: If a pokemon holds an Exp. Share then it can earn experience from a battle without even battling.

name: Scientist
main dialogs: I think I let out one of our test subjects by accident.

name: Scientist
main dialogs: I think we're missing one of our test subjects.

name: Mark
initial dialogs: My Chansey gave me this stone earlier but I don't know what to do with it.;Here, why don't you have it.
main dialogs: The stone I gave you is really smooth isn't it?

name: Rene
main dialogs: I've come here to investigate the psychic pokemon in the forest to the East of here.

name: Jeremiah
main dialogs: I was catching bugs in the forest East of here but then I got attacked by some mean psychic pokemon.

name: Rue
main dialogs: Have you heard of escape rooms?;I've heard that some cities in other regions have them and they sound really fun.;And they all have different vibes: there are some that are meant to be really scary.

name: Laura
main dialogs: I wish there were tennis courts in this area.

name: Benedict
main dialogs: Have you heard of the legendary pokemon Arceus?;It is said that it created the whole universe.;I'm studying it with these books.

name: Arthur
main dialogs: I heard that there's talk of building a "pokemon day care" in Casswick.

name: Millie
main dialogs: I think there's going to be a "pokemon day care" built in Casswick.;If they make one, I'll try get a job there.;I've babysat my cousin's children quite a few times so I have experience.

name: Scientist
main dialogs: I think I dropped some potions somewhere around here.;If you find them, feel free to have them.

name: Dutch
main dialogs: Aren't the waves so peaceful...;My friend lives in Tildahill and him and I both love to watch the waves.

name: Carly
main dialogs: Hi! Have you been to the Poke Mart? It's the blue building next to me.;You can buy supplies there.;Also, if your pokemon are hurt, you should go to the Pokemon Centre to heal them.; The Pokemon Centre is the red building next to the Poke Mart.

name: Cathy
initial dialogs: Past this gate is Route 2.;There's quite a lot of water pokemon there.;Here, have some Net Balls, these will make it easier to catch the water pokemon.
main dialogs: Net balls make catching water and bug pokemon easier.;You should try them on the water pokemon on Route 2.

name: Micah
main dialogs: Aren't the waves so calm...;I have a friend in Okford who also loves to watch the waves.

name: Chris
main dialogs: Something about the forest to the East of here scares me.

name: Jude
initial dialogs: I just battled Barney and lost.;I'm going to go to Tildahill Passage to train more before I challenge him again.
main dialogs: I still need to train more before I challenge Barney again.

name: Jimmy
initial dialogs: I was walking around Esperi Forest and found this strange claw.;It's very sharp so I don't want to keep it, you can have it.
main dialogs: There's lots of dangerous things in Esperi Forest.

name: Isabelle
main dialogs: Casswick is a small place but lots of trainers pass through trying to collect gym badges like you.;Good luck on your travels and if your pokemon need a rest don't forget to stop at a Pokemon Centre to give them some rest.

name: Scientist
main dialogs: We just bought this fossil machine but we're still setting it up.

name: Guard
main dialogs: The pokemon past this point are very strong.;Unfortunately, I can't let you pass until I know that you are strong enough to defend yourself against them.;Defeating gym leaders could help prove your strength.

name: Soloman
main dialogs: I've collected as many books as I can about dragon pokemon.;Someday, I'll know enough to catch a really strong pokemon like Salamance.

name: Worker
main dialogs: Sorry, there's construction work going on past here and I can't let you go past at the moment.

name: Jennie
initial dialogs: Are you a trainer?;I used to be a trainer but then I settled down here.;Here, have this lucky egg that I used to use to give to your pokemon.;If a pokemon holds it then it will grow faster.
main dialogs: If you let a pokemon hold that lucky egg, it should grow faster.

name: Ollie
main dialogs: I used to live in Jubilife City in Sinnoh and it was really interesting but also really loud and busy.;I love the tranquility of Nagaka Village here in Kagmori.

name: Troy
initial dialogs: I found this strange scale when I was fishing.;I don't have any use for it so you can have it, here.
main dialogs: I think Clamperl quite like that scale I gave you.

name: Elliot
main dialogs: I've been fishing my whole life but I'm starting to get tired of it.;I might retire soon.

name: Luke
main dialogs: When I'm not out sailing, I spend time with my son.

name: Manny
main dialogs: My dad goes sailing a lot.;When he's away, I train my pokemon.

name: Trev the Traveller
initial dialogs: Hi there, my name is Trevor but people usually call me Trev the Traveller because I'm always travelling.;If my boat wasn't broken then I'd be happy to take you somewhere on it.;Sorry to disappoint you!
main dialogs: If my boat wasn't broken then I'd be happy to take you somewhere on it.;Sorry to disappoint you!

name: Gemma
initial dialogs: Are you going into Sinkerlin Ascent?;There's a lot of pokemon there and it's quite dangerous.;Here, have these repels to keep the pokemon away from you.
main dialogs: It's a long way up Sinkerlin Ascent so be careful and bring potions for your pokemon.

name: Carl
main dialogs: My family are skiing but I hurt my leg yesterday so I have to stay here today.

name: Ron
main dialogs: I haven't skiied before but I heard that it's really dangerous.;I hope I don't break any bones.;Maybe I shouldn't go actually...;No, I have to try!;Oh, I don't know...

name: Jen
main dialogs: I'm waiting to go ski but my husband, Ron, seems to be taking ages to get ready.;I wonder what's up with him.

name: Roger
initial dialogs: I hiked the whole way up here to go skiing and now I'm exhausted.;That strange ice puzzle on Route 6 really tired me out.
main dialogs: I'm really tired now, especially after that strange ice puzzle on Route 6.

name: Antony
initial dialogs: When I was much younger, I used to come here to Chillborough every year with my family to ski.;Everyone would come: my parents, my cousins, their parents and our grandparents.;Now, though, I hardly talk to my cousins but I still come here because I still love to ski - even if it's terrible for my back.;Oh, sorry, I didn't mean to go into such a long story, here have this as an apology.
main dialogs: I won't drag you into another story now, don't worry, hahaha!

name: Izzy
initial dialogs: If you are fighting ice pokemon, you should make sure that your pokemon don't get frozen.;Here, have these, if you use them on a frozen pokemon, it will be thawed out.
main dialogs: Use ice heals to thaw out frozen pokemon so they can keep fighting.
